attributes.action: NEVER ALLOW HOMOSEXUALS TO ADOPT CHILDREN.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children in need of care require a normal homely environment, i.e a mother and father. I hope every straight thinking parent or individual will agree, and sign my petition. For the childrens sake, please sign now and try to stop this before it happens. Without your support it surely will. Please, Prime Minister,think straight.
